mapper.select: select * from wms_gdxd_out_just where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy.mm.dd') = #{date}

select batch_no,floor(((to_date(to_char(cast(wo_end_time as date),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(to_char(cast(wo_start_time as date),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) *24*60)) as boxtotalnum from wms_gdxd_out_just where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy.mm.dd') = #{date}
select * from wms_gdxd_out_just where wo_no = #{woNo}
select * from wms_gdxd_out where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy.mm.dd') = #{date}
select * from wms_gdxd_out where wo_no = #{woNo}

select batch_no,floor(((to_date(to_char(cast(wo_end_time as date),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(to_char(cast(wo_start_time as date),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) *24*60)) as boxtotalnum from wms_gdxd_out where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy.mm.dd') = #{date}
select equ_id from(select trim(equ_id) as equ_id from wms_gdxd_out group by equ_id) group by equ_id
SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.*,ROWNUM AS rowno FROM wms_gdxd_out t where ROWNUM <= 1000*(#{count}+1)) table_alias where trim(table_alias.equ_id) = #{equId}
select team_cd from(select trim(team_cd) as team_cd from wms_gdxd_out group by team_cd) group by team_cd
select * from wms_gdxd_out where trim(team_cd) = #{teamCd}
select mat_nm from wms_gdxd_out group by mat_nm

select alias.* from (select w.*,ROWNUM as rowno from wms_gdxd_out w where w.equ_id = #{equId} and w.mat_nm = #{brand} and w.wo_start_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and w.wo_end_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and ROWNUM <= #{rangeEnd}) alias where alias.rowno > #{rangeStart}

select alias.* from (select w.*,ROWNUM as rowno from wms_gdxd_out w where trim(team_cd) = #{teamCd} and w.mat_nm = #{brand} and w.wo_start_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and w.wo_end_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and ROWNUM <= #{rangeEnd}) alias where alias.rowno > #{rangeStart}
select count(*) from wms_gdxd_out
select alias.* from (select w.*,ROWNUM as rowno from wms_gdxd_out w where wo_state = #{woState} and ROWNUM <= #{length}) alias
select mat_nm,count(batch_no) as boxtotalnum from wms_gdxd_out where trim(team_cd) = #{classTeam} group by mat_nm
select mat_nm,sum(boxtotalnum) as boxtotalnum from wms_gdxd_out where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy.mm') = #{month} GROUP by mat_nm
select mat_nm,sum(boxtotalnum) as boxtotalnum from wms_gdxd_out where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy') = #{year} GROUP by mat_nm

select alias.* from (select w.*,ROWNUM as rowno from wms_gdxd_out w where w.equ_id = #{equId} and w.mat_nm = #{brand} and w.wo_start_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and w.wo_end_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and (batch_no=#{batch} or #{batch} is null) and ROWNUM <= #{rangeEnd}) alias where alias.rowno > #{rangeStart}

select alias.* from (select w.*,ROWNUM as rowno from wms_gdxd_out w where trim(team_cd) = #{teamCd} and w.mat_nm = #{brand} and w.wo_start_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and w.wo_end_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and (batch_no=#{batch} or #{batch} is null) and ROWNUM <= #{rangeEnd}) alias where alias.rowno > #{rangeStart}
